item.title: Clubs and Organizations
item.description: These are some of the Loyola affiliated groups I participate in during my free time. Rambler Investment Fund (RIF) RIF is a student managed portfolio valued at over 1 million dollars. RIF provides students with opportunities to build skills in financial analysis and risk assessment as well as to network with industry professionals. I am a developer on RIF’s quantitative analytics team and write software to automate and visualize stock analysis.

item.title: Publications
